title: Process a Special Service Request
description: A customer requests a service not covered by the standard tariff, such as providing a floating crane for a heavy lift. A manager must price and approve the service.

tasks.description: Receive the request for the special service.
tasks.expected_outcome: Manager understands the customer's requirement for a floating crane.

tasks.description: Determine the cost of providing the service by getting quotes from subcontractors or calculating internal costs.
tasks.expected_outcome: Manager determines the cost of the service will be $10,000.

tasks.description: Provide a formal quotation to the customer for their approval before arranging the service.
tasks.expected_outcome: A quote is sent to the customer for the special service.
